---
output: 
  officedown::rdocx_document:
    base_format: "bookdown::word_document2"
    reference_docx: ASSETS/WORD-DOCUMENT/STYLE-WORD-V1.docx
    tables:
      style: Table
      caption:
       style: Table Caption
       pre: 'Tabla '
       sep: " <w:br/>"
    plots:
      style: Normal
      align: center
      topcaption: true
      caption:
       style: Image Caption
       pre: 'Figura '
       sep: " <w:br/>"
    number_sections: true
csl: ASSETS/WORD-DOCUMENT/CLS/apa.csl
bibliography: [ASSETS/BIB/camel.bib,
              ASSETS/BIB/extras-bib.bib]
nocite: '@*'
---

<!-- Configuración CHUNKS -->
```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = FALSE,
                      message = FALSE,
                      warning = FALSE,
                      fig.align='center',
                      fig.cap = TRUE,
                      dpi=700)

rootProyectMain <- 'LASPUMSS/APLICACION-DE-LA-METODOLOGIA-CAMEL-BOLIIVIA/RECURSOS-INVESTIGACION/WORD-DOCUMENT/'
knitr::opts_knit$set(root.dir = getwd())
options(scipen=999)

br <- officer::run_linebreak()

require(officedown)
require(officer)
```
